Kendo.Mvc.UI.Fluent.ChartNoteLabelBuilder

Defines the fluent interface for configuring the chart note label.

Methods

Position(Kendo.Mvc.UI.ChartNoteLabelPosition)

Sets the labels position

Parameters

position Kendo.Mvc.UI.ChartNoteLabelPosition

The labels position.

Example (ASPX)

<% Html.Kendo().Chart()
    .Name("Chart")
    .ValueAxis(a => a.Numeric()
        .Note(note => note
            .Label(label => label
                .Position(ChartNoteLabelPosition.Inside)
            )
        )
    )
    .Render();
%>

Text(System.String)

Sets the labels position

Parameters

text System.String

The labels position.

Example (ASPX)

<% Html.Kendo().Chart()
    .Name("Chart")
    .ValueAxis(a => a.Numeric()
        .Note(note => note
            .Data(data =>
            {
                data.Add().Value(1).Text("A");
                data.Add().Value(2).Text("B");
            })
        )
    )
    .Render();
%>
